068702d69533256fca702acb12740883a24e2591.commitMessage:
Replace StringBuffer with StringBuilder. #46

Fixes squid:S1149 violations.

4c078ba710068498ca513ce115993e30dab4562a.commitMessage:
Make "private" methods "static" where possible. #46

SonarQube rule: ["private" methods that don't access instance data should be "static"](http://nemo.sonarqube.org/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS2325).

Rationale: private methods that don't access instance data can be static to prevent any misunderstanding about the contract of the method.

c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

e50e1fcd1c17ba1f73d11df38382907cc163a1d1.commitMessage:
Use the new syntactic sugar "for loop".

End of the cosmetic changes.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

b78f144ee4613e1d503624067b4a03d10b3515a8.commitMessage: Fixed bug in logic JavadocStyle check uses to get main-section of javadoc (bug 1291847).

5fb27c0fe21ed36f057767862e96017d46a72686.commitMessage: Fix for 897749 (JavadocStyleCheck @value tag). Fixed javadoc inline tags handling.

611722a893e0c6362b693f5c629a902a83590cbf.commitMessage: Fixed bug 798405 JavadocStyleCheck doesn't accept {@inheritDoc} javadoc

51dae59b8dcfb5a34f2a8a5b3e788eb6599a1df3.commitMessage: New Javadoc style check from Chris Stillwell.
